objects.text:
• Seamless ecosystem integration
  across all devices
• High-resolution displays with
  vibrant color reproduction
• Built-in iCloud synchronization
  for effortless file sharing

product_details.name: Complete Apple Ecosystem Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Package
product_details.description:
• Premium Apple MacBook Pro with Retina Display and backlit keyboard
• Seamless ecosystem integration across all three devices
• iPad with stunning edge-to-edge display, perfect for productivity and entertainment
• Latest iPhone model with advanced camera system
• All devices feature high-resolution displays with vibrant color reproduction
• macOS and iOS platforms for maximum compatibility and productivity
• Powerful performance for professional work and creative tasks
• Sleek aluminum design across all devices
• Built-in iCloud synchronization for seamless file sharing
• Perfect for professionals, creatives, and tech enthusiasts
• All devices in excellent condition with latest software updates
• Includes full connectivity options (Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, etc.)
• Ideal for remote work, content creation, and multimedia consumption
• Premium build quality with durable construction

banner_details:
The banner features a clean, product-focused layout with a soft dual-tone gradient background on the left and a white background on the right. It employs a vertical split design, with textual content on the left and product imagery on the right. The text starts with a bold headline (`heading`) introducing the product deal, followed by a vibrant blue subheading (`subheading`) describing the package. Informational details about the product's features are provided in a compact bullet list (`description`). A bold price (`price`) is highlighted clearly, and an eye-catching blue call-to-action button (`cta`) encourages immediate engagement. The right half displays a composite product image (`product_image`), showcasing the devices included in the package offer.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #f2f2f2 → #e6e6e6 (soft neutral)
- Accent Gradient & CTA Button: #007AFF → #0050A0 (vivid blue)
- Heading & Price: #333333 (deep grey)
- Subheading: #007AFF (saturated blue)
- Description Text: #555555 (medium grey)
- CTA Text: #FFFFFF (white)
product_color: The product image features three Apple devices—MacBook, iPad, and iPhone—against a white background, showcasing a clean, modern aesthetic. The main color palette includes Metallic Silver (#C0C0C0) for the devices' exteriors, Deep Black (#000000) for the keyboard and screens, and Highlight Blue (#4A90E2) from the iPad and iPhone displays. The MacBook screen uses a soft gradient blending of Rose Pink (#F4B6C2), Sky Blue (#A2CFF7), and Earthy Brown (#7E5841), creating a calming, natural scene. These shades blend smoothly but are highlighted through contrast against the neutral device colors. This palette evokes minimalism, sophistication, and advanced technology, perfect for advertisement banners.
